While the familiar [part](part.html) root is ubiquitous in Egyptian, separate is much less clear:  
The 'P' of 'separate' is missing or hidden:  
ğ“†“ ğ“Šƒ ğ“‚‹ ğ“‚¡ | separate (from) |zerr? TschÃ¼ÃŸer / 'Abschiez'  
ğ“†“ ğ“‹´ ğ“‚‹ ğ“‚¦ | separate (from), raise, clear (a road), support | interstingly separate â‹ support  
ğ“ƒ› ğ“…± ğ“‚§ | separate (x from y) | ???  chien â‹ schnitt ? â‡” [Teil](Teil.html) â‡” [Kalb](Kalb.html) ?  

One might need to look into [carve](carve.html) / [scar](scar.html) to understand the forms.
